post.author: gw
post.body:
I've been working on a SP map for Quake 4 for a long time now, and have some models that i made for it, haven't had much time to work on it, so i decided to release them, i'm sure someone will find some use for them .








Quake 4 version http://premium.fileden.com/premium/2007 ... models.zip


Doom 3 version http://premium.fileden.com/premium/2007 ... models.zip

post.author: BJA
post.body: Great models, thanks for sharing them with the community but does this mean you won't finish your q4 map?

post.author: gw
post.body: Thanks glad you like them, i'm still working on it, but its just going to take a long time with it being summer, and not being on the computer that much, i'll probably get a lot done this winter though.

post.author: Hexen Terzo
post.body: WoW!! Great!!! thank you!!

post.author: Ivan_the_B
post.body: thank you!

post.author: Arno
post.body:
Thank you very much for sharing these models! Great job, gw!
I love the train model, it perfectly fits the map I'm working on. I plan to include some of the other models as well.
You can count on it that you'll be properly credited for your work when the map is released (nowhere near finished atm).

One question/request: do you have any plans for modeling a freight wagon, to accompany the locomotive model? I could use such a model as well.

This will give you an idea of how the locomotive is placed in my map:

post.author: gw
post.body:
Yeah i was planning to make about three or four different cars for it, i have one almost done all i have to do is finish the wheels, i'll put a link up for it as soon as i finish it.

That shot looks real nice

post.author: Arno
post.body:
Excellent!
I estimate that it's still gonna take a couple of months before I can release anything playable, so take your time.

And, of course, good luck with your map as well!

post.author: Domipheus
post.body:
Thanks for this, we may find a use for some of these models in Enemy Territory: Wheels of War.

Would it be ok to use them in a mod; and if we did indeed use any of them, to credit you in the mod credits?

Thanks,

Domipheus
P.S. You wouldnt want to model some cars for us would you?

post.author: gw
post.body:
Yeah sure you can use them.

Yeah i would love to make some cars for your mod, thats one of my favorite things to model, here's a shot of some cars i made for Trackmania.

post.author: CrimsonHead
post.body: Amazing! That's some really nice work there.

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
Wow! This is the kind of stuff I look foreword to getting for free! Thanks a bunch man, great models!

-Ajm113
